name: Over the Light
description:
Over the Light is a game where you can’t trust your eyes. Using a mysterious flashlight, you will get through optical puzzles across several rooms.

This game has been made during the Global Game Jam 2021 with the theme "Lost and Found".

CREDITS: 

Johan-Charles Koell-Keith : Sound Designer/Composer

Anne-Lise MANGOURNY “Mya” : 2D/UI Artist

Rémy Tauziac "crazyrems" : 3D/VFX Artist

Gaëtan Vergeot "Guitoon" : Developer

"Celthim" : Developer

CONTROLS:

WASD: Move the player
Left Mouse: Toggle Flashlight
Space: Jump
E: Interact

Escape: Pause the game
